name: A Stranger In Your Eyes
description: Welcome! A Stranger In Your Eyes is a storytelling game with fun swinging around! It focuses on a mom who wants her son to know that even if she passes. He will not be alone. The mother is suffering from a disease called Alzheimer's. This is my first gameJam, and a game that I fully built from scratch, composed, and exported in 4 days. Other than that thanks for supporting me and I hope you enjoy it.
